Signal.Description: If implemented by specific IOServer the signal can be set true to disable output.
Signal.Name: OutputDisable

Signal.Description: The time needed to perform one send and receive.
Signal.Name: Send-Receive Roundtrip time

Signal.Description: Number of items working in ioserver.
Signal.Name: NumberOfNodesOnline

Signal.Description: Number of items total in ioserver.
Signal.Name: NumberOfNodes

Alarm.Description: Alarm is triggered (with Text containing the list of errors) when some node of the component (like operator) has configuration fault.
Alarm.Name: ConfigurationFaults

Parameter.Description: Delay before setting Transmission Error alarm.
Parameter.Name: SignalTimeout

Timer.Description: Timer used to delay setting Transmission Error alarm. Timeout-delay is configured in Parameter SignalTimeout.
Timer.Name: SignalTimeoutTimer
